SEARCH
Package org.red5.server.tomcat

Class TomcatLoader

java.lang.Object
org.red5.server.LoaderBase
org.red5.server.tomcat.TomcatLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
LoaderMXBean, ShutdownMXBean, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.DisposableBean, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
Direct Known Subclasses:
RTMPTLoader, TomcatVHostLoader
@ManagedResource(objectName="org.red5.server:type=TomcatLoader", description="TomcatLoader") public class TomcatLoader extends LoaderBase implements org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, org.springframework.beans.factory.DisposableBean, LoaderMXBean
Red5 loader for Tomcat. http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-8.5-doc/api/index.html
Author:
Paul Gregoire (mondain@gmail.com)
